name: "The Son Also Draws" Online Quiz | 'Family Guy'-  Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What organization is Chris a member of in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
The Scouts.

	Chris is a member of the Scouts until he is banned from the organization.  Peter fights to have Chris rejoin, and Chris decides he doesn't want to.

questions.text: What event must Chris take part in at the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
A soap box derby.

	Peter makes Chris a soap box derby racer out of a beer keg and Chris accidentally breaks the steering wheel when he begins the race.

questions.text: Where are the headquarters of the organization Chris is a member of at the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
New York.

	Peter (not knowing that Chris wants to leave the Scouts) takes the family on a road trip to New York in order to have Chris re-enlisted.

questions.text: When the family is playing the movie guessing game in the car, what movie did Lois use?
questions.explanation:
Cool Runnings.

	Peter successfully guesses the correct movie after asking a single question.  "Cool Runnings" is a movie about a Jamaican bobsled team in the Olympic Games.

questions.text: What is the name of the Indian casino the family must make a pit stop at?
questions.explanation:
Geronimo's Palace.

	At Geronimo's Palace, Lois becomes addicted to gambling for a brief period, and she loses the family car to a slot machine.

questions.text: Name the comedian performing at the Indian casino.
questions.explanation:
Carrot Scalp & Carrotscalp.

	Carrot Scalp imitates Carrot Top, who is another comedian with orange hair and cheesy jokes.  Stewie gets his words in before the act is over.

questions.text: Who goes with Peter on his spiritual vision quest?
questions.explanation:
Chris.

	Chris decides to go with his father because that way he can tell him that he's more interested in drawing than being a member of Scouts.

questions.text: What is the name of the tree that had fallen in the forest?
questions.explanation:
Scott.

	Peter communicates with nature on his vision quest and asks a tree: "If a tree falls in the forest and no one's around, does it still make a sound".  The tree proves that it will make noise even after it has fallen.

The Fonz.

	The Fonz talks to Peter after a long night and recommends that he listen to Chris.  Chris then tells his dad about not wanting to be a Scout, and they go back to the casino.

questions.text: Which family member stays home during the whole episode?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Brian decides not to go to New York and stays home watching reruns of "One Day at a Time".
